question: Will @Snowden tweet again by May 1, 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Edward Snowden's verified Twitter account (@Snowden) tweets at least once after April 18, 2022, and by May 1, 2022, (11:59:59 PM ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be Edward Snowden's verified Twitter account: https://twitter.com/snowden.

Please note, only the @Snowden verified Twitter account counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Edward Snowden tweets from another account, it will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

question: Will $ETH be above $3,100 on April 28, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if the price of Ethereum (ETH) will be above $3,100 in USD on April 28, 2022 (12 PM ET). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ethereum ($ETH) has a candlestick closing price of $3,100.01 or more, as per the resolution source, on April 28, 2022, 12pm ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Thu 28 April 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be at 12:30 PM ET, April 28, 2022.
